content:
It's great that you had a wonderful experience at the contemporary dance workshop. It's always exciting to try out new styles and learn from different instructors.

I'm glad I could help you with the Salsa studio recommendations. I think it's a great idea to check out their websites and see which one resonates with you the most. You might also want to read reviews, watch videos, or ask friends for recommendations to get a better feel for each studio.

Remember, the most important thing is to find a studio and instructor that make you feel comfortable, supported, and excited to learn and improve. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further recommendations.

Good luck, and I hope you find an amazing Salsa studio that sparks your passion for dance!
